text: Bathi bona: “Thina sifumene ubunzima phambi kokuba wena uze kuthi, kanti kusenjalo nangoku sele wena ufikile kuthi.” Wathi yena; “Kungenzeka ukuba iNkosi yenu Izitshabalalise iintshaba zenu, Ize yenze nina nibe ziindlalifa emva kwazo ehlabathini, ukuze Inijonge ukuba niya kuqhuba njani na nina.”
